title: Action News: Resident Evil 0: HD Remaster - Achievements fordern S Rang und Speicher-Verzicht
text:
Resident Evil 0: HD Remaster Achievements fordern S Rang und Speicher-Verzicht 
Ein Resident Evil-Spiel durchzocken, ohne ein einziges Mal zu speichern? Wer alle Gamerscore-Punkte von Resident Evil 0: HD Remaster haben will, muss sich dieser Herausforderung stellen. 
Wenn es für das Abschließen von Resident Evil 0: HD Remaster mit einem S-Rang nur 25 Gamerscore Punkte gibt und dasselbe für den Schwierigkeitsgrad "Schwer" gilt, müssen einige deutlich kniffligere Errungenschaften bereitstehen. Von diesen gibt es zwei Stück, die jeweils 90 Zähler einbringen. "Save Your Prayers" verlangt das Absolvieren des Spiels, ohne zu speichern, während man für "This is Serious Business" kein einziges Item zum Heilen verwenden darf. 

Von den insgesamt 47 Achievements, die Resident Evil 0: HD Remaster auffährt, sind übrigens satte 28 versteckt. Die meisten davon verraten die Namen der Level oder Bossgegner, ergo sollten nur jene aufpassen, die das Original nicht gespielt haben bzw. nicht wissen (wollen), was sie in diesem Titel erwartet. 

Resident Evil 0: HD Remaster Achievements S is for S.T.A.R.S. (25 Punkte) - Finish the game with rank S. From Zero to Hero (25 Punkte) - Finish the game on Hard difficulty. Who's Got the Herb? (25 Punkte) - Finish the game without combining herbs. Save Your Prayers (90 Punkte) - Finish the game without saving. Allergic to First Aid Spray (25 Punkte) - Finish the game without using a First-Aid Spray. This is Serious Business (90 Punkte) - Finish the game without using a recovery item (including Green Chemicals). Zero In (15 Punkte) - Defeat an enemy with a critical-hit headshot. Burned Alive (15 Punkte) - Defeat an enemy by burning them. Dead, Dead, Deadski (15 Punkte) - Defeat a zombie by stomping on them. This is How You Recycle (15 Punkte) - Create a Molotov Cocktail. Fashion Plate (15 Punkte) - Change into a costume. Here I Come to Save the Day (15 Punkte) - Attack an enemy to save your partner who is grappling with that enemy. Guns are Too Quick (15 Punkte) - Defeat an enemy with a knife. Misdirected Hostility (15 Punkte) - Destroy a zombie's legs. Fileophile (15 Punkte) - Read all files. Apprentice of Unlocking (15 Punkte) - Obtain all keys and use them all. Find Time to Combine (15 Punkte) - Combine every type of herb with each other. I Could Shoot, You Know (25 Punkte) - Obtain all weapons. I'm a Medic, Not a Bodybuilder (15 Punkte) - Try to push something heavy with Rebecca. 
Versteckte Achievements Train Complete (15 Punkte) - Complete the train. Training Facility Complete (15 Punkte) - Complete the training facility. Laboratory Complete (15 Punkte) - Complete the laboratory. Factory Complete (15 Punkte) - Complete the factory. Treatment Plant Complete (15 Punkte) - Complete the treatment plant. Taking the Sting Out (15 Punkte) - Defeat Stinger. Centurion Disciplinarian (15 Punkte) - Defeat Centurion. Die, Devil Bird! (15 Punkte) - Defeat Infected Bat. Proto Tyrant Down (15 Punkte) - Fight off the Proto Tyrant. Proto Tyrant Down Again (15 Punkte) - Defeat the Proto Tyrant. Hey, Queenie! Feast on this! (15 Punkte) - Defeat Queen Leech. That's Officer Chambers to You (30 Punkte) - Defeat all bosses except Centurion using Rebecca. Alley-oop! (15 Punkte) - Shoot down a Hunter or an Eliminator while they are jump attacking in the air. Sit, Boy, Sit! Good Dog (15 Punkte) - Break free of a Cerberus while they are biting you or trying to push you down. Custom to Bust 'Em (15 Punkte) - Create a Custom Handgun. Green is the Color (15 Punkte) - Use a Green Chemical. How 'Bout a Light, Bud? (15 Punkte) - Defeat Mimicry Marcus with a Molotov Cocktail or a Napalm Grenade. I Have the Touch (25 Punkte) - Defeat Mimicry Marcus for the first time only using a knife. Winged Spawn of Satan (25 Punkte) - Defeat 16 bats in the church. Welcome to Team Wesker (25 Punkte) - Put on Team Wesker costume. Calm the Zombie Nerves (15 Punkte) - Play the piano using Rebecca. On Leather Wings (15 Punkte) - Get picked up by the Infected Bat. Trying Out New Things (15 Punkte) - Play Leech Hunter. A Weird Interest in Leeches (25 Punkte) - Finish Leech Hunter with rank A. Leech-Shaped Hole in my Heart (15 Punkte) - Finish Leech Hunter with rank E or above. Who Needs Partners? (25 Punkte) - Collect all of only one color of Leech Charms. Distracted from the Hunt (30 Punkte) - Defeat all enemies in Leech Hunter. 20/20 Vision (30 Punkte) - Kill 50 enemies with the Death Stare at full charge. Bitte registrieren , um die Quelle zu sehen.
